message:
Hi Colton, 
Thank you for sharing this valuable information. I am running in to this exact same issue. I tried to open the HTML object in App Designer, copied the script content and tried to create an HTML object thru PIA. I still get the line breaks. Is it because i copied the javascript from app designer HTML ? Is it possible to copy it from database table without getting the line breaks ? 
Your help is very much appreciated. 
Thank you
